title: What are three ways musicians can manipulate music with technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are Many ways… lets see just 3. Control the and manipulate the acoustics of the room. This would include making and arranging/placing sound absorbers and sound reflectors. I love the metal scrim stands with holes in them.  2. Manipulate the sound signal after it is captured by a microphone; such as using preamps or transformers and resistors or tubes.  3. Run the sound/music through a Soft Synth and use the oscillators and modulators and LFO etc.  or even a real one…  there is really ENDLESS ways to do this… tc
